Ice Air LLC, a heating, ventilation and air conditioning equipment manufacturer, hired a team at Blank Rome Government Relations including former Sen. and Energy Secretary Spencer Abraham to lobby for “an exemption from China tariffs on imported HVAC equipment,” per a filing.
